page.title: 04ALLET FARM, NEAR TRURO.
page.content: This farm consists of only 20 acres in 6 fields, since the sale of some land in 1966. The present owner is a semi- retired 75-year-old single man who requires considerable help from his neighbours, who take care of his shopping & transport. He is, however able to cook & clean, & do what is required in looking after up to 10 horses which he keeps on his land for a friend who runs stables for pony- trekking near Perranporth. He treats the horses as pets & obviously enjoys their company.Some hay is produced for his own use; this is harvested for him by local contractors. Good stabling is available but is only used when there is a rare spell of severe weather. No other enterprise is undertaken but he grows all his own vegetables & makes full use of his 24 by 12ft.greenhouse.
